name: Belly Up
description:
"So why are we going to the bottom of the ocean?"

I don't know.

"And why are we shooting a bunch of fish?"

I still don't know.

Just stay alive and try to avoid going "belly up" emkay?

Tab - Switch Weapons

 Right Click - Dash 

Left Click - Shoot 

Space - Break

Credits:

Game Design - unbirthday

Programming - colorplease

Sound Design - CDplaya
